text: Ara tara bale -- ''e'isaba gabadi-pasu o sasyaksetra nisid'dha, ke'u e'isaba khete parabe na amara yadera iccha kari tara byatita’’, -- tadera dharananuyayi, ebam kataka pasu yadera pitha nisedha kara hayeche, ara gabadi-pasu yadera upare tara allah‌ra nama smarana kare na, -- e-saba tamra birud'dhe mithya udbhabana. Tini acire'i tadera pratiphala debena tara ya udbhabana kare thake tara jan'ya.
